content.json:
## NSG Flow Logs Analytics 
---

This workbook contains some queries to characterize existing Azure traffic. Different statistics will be measured, so that anomalies can be visually identified looking at the different charts.

parameters.name: VM_RG
parameters.label: Source VM Resource Group
parameters.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where isnotempty (VM_s)
| extend VM_RG=tostring(split(VM_s,'/')[0])
| distinct VM_RG

parameters.name: VM_Name
parameters.label: Source VM Name
parameters.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where isnotempty (VM_s)
| extend VM_Name=tostring(split(VM_s,'/')[1])
| distinct VM_Name

content.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| where isnotempty(FlowDirection_s) and isnotempty(FlowStatus_s)
| extend FlowDirectionLong=iif(FlowDirection_s == "I", "Inbound", "Outbound")
| extend FlowStatusLong=iif(FlowStatus_s == "A", "Allowed", "Denied")
| extend FlowLabel = strcat(FlowDirectionLong, "/", FlowStatusLong)
| project TimeGenerated, InboundBytes_d, OutboundBytes_d, VM_RG, VM_name, FlowLabel, NSGList_s
| summarize sum(InboundBytes_d) by FlowLabel, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render areachart
content.title: Ingress bytes (in and outbound flows)

content.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| where isnotempty(FlowDirection_s) and isnotempty(FlowStatus_s)
| extend FlowDirectionLong=iif(FlowDirection_s == "I", "Inbound", "Outbound")
| extend FlowStatusLong=iif(FlowStatus_s == "A", "Allowed", "Denied")
| extend FlowLabel = strcat(FlowDirectionLong, "/", FlowStatusLong)
| project TimeGenerated, InboundBytes_d, OutboundBytes_d, VM_RG, VM_name, FlowLabel, NSGList_s
| summarize sum(OutboundBytes_d) by FlowLabel, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render areachart
content.title: Egress bytes (in and outbound flows)

content.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| where isnotempty(SrcIP_s) 
| extend Volume=InboundBytes_d + OutboundBytes_d
| project TimeGenerated, Volume, SrcIP_s
| summarize sum(Volume) by SrcIP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render areachart
content.title: Volume (Inbound+Outbound) per source IP

content.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| extend Volume=InboundBytes_d + OutboundBytes_d
| where isnotempty(L4Protocol_s)
| extend DestPortLong = strcat(L4Protocol_s, toint(DestPort_d))
| project TimeGenerated, Volume, VM_RG, VM_name, NSGList_s, SrcIP_s, DestPortLong
| summarize sum(Volume) by DestPortLong, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render areachart
content.title: Volume (Inbound+Outbound) per destination port

content.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| where isnotempty(SrcIP_s) and isnotempty(DestIP_s)
| distinct bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), SrcIP_s, DestIP_s
| summarize count() by SrcIP_s, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| render areachart
content.title: Count of destination IPs per source IP

content.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend SrcVM_RG = iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend SrcVM_name = iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| distinct SrcIP_s, DestIP_s, SrcVM_name, SrcVM_RG
| summarize count() by SrcIP_s, SrcVM_name, SrcVM_RG
| where isnotempty(SrcIP_s)
| project-rename NumOfDstIPs=count_
| top 5 by NumOfDstIPs
content.title: Top VMs with number of Dest IPs

content.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| extend Volume=InboundBytes_d + OutboundBytes_d
| where isnotempty(L4Protocol_s)
| extend DestPortLong = strcat(L4Protocol_s, toint(DestPort_d))
| project TimeGenerated, Volume, VM_RG, VM_name, NSGList_s, SrcIP_s, DestPortLong
| summarize sum(Volume) by DestPortLong, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| summarize avg(sum_Volume) by DestPortLong
| join (AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| extend Volume=InboundBytes_d + OutboundBytes_d
| where isnotempty(L4Protocol_s)
| extend DestPortLong = strcat(L4Protocol_s, toint(DestPort_d))
| project TimeGenerated, Volume, VM_RG, VM_name, NSGList_s, SrcIP_s, DestPortLong
| summarize sum(Volume) by DestPortLong, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m))
on DestPortLong
| extend DiffToAvg = abs(sum_Volume - avg_sum_Volume)
| where DiffToAvg > 0
| project TimeGenerated, DestPortLong, DiffToAvg
| render areachart
content.title: Absolute Average Deviation Bandwidth per Port

content.query:
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| extend Volume=InboundBytes_d + OutboundBytes_d
| where isnotempty(L4Protocol_s)
| extend DestPortLong = strcat(L4Protocol_s, toint(DestPort_d))
| project TimeGenerated, Volume, VM_RG, VM_name, NSGList_s, SrcIP_s, DestPortLong
| summarize sum(Volume) by DestPortLong, VM_name, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| summarize avg(sum_Volume) by DestPortLong, VM_name
| join (AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend VM_RG=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[0])
| extend VM_name=iif(isempty(VM1_s), '', split(VM1_s,'/')[1])
| where iif(isempty('{VM_RG}'), true, VM_RG contains '{VM_RG}')
| where iif(isempty('{VM_Name}'), true, VM_name contains '{VM_Name}')
| extend Volume=InboundBytes_d + OutboundBytes_d
| where isnotempty(L4Protocol_s)
| extend DestPortLong = strcat(L4Protocol_s, toint(DestPort_d))
| project TimeGenerated, Volume, VM_RG, VM_name, NSGList_s, SrcIP_s, DestPortLong
| summarize sum(Volume) by DestPortLong, VM_name, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m))
on DestPortLong, VM_name
| extend DiffToAvg = round(abs(sum_Volume - avg_sum_Volume))
| project TimeGenerated, DestPortLong, DiffToAvg, VM_name
| where isnotempty(VM_name) and DiffToAvg > 0
| summarize max(DiffToAvg) by VM_name, DestPortLong
| sort by max_DiffToAvg desc
content.title: Top VMs and protocols per Bandwidth Absolute Average Deviation
